content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: VISITDY
      operator: exists
    - name: VISITNUM
      operator: is_contained_by
      value: $tv_visitnum
    - name: VISITDY
      operator: not_equal_to
      value: TV.VISITDY
Match Datasets:
  - Name: TV
    Keys:
      - VISITNUM
Operations:
  - domain: TV
    id: $tv_visitnum
    name: VISITNUM
    operator: distinct
Core:
  Id: QC.CDISC.SDTMIG.CG0032
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: Verify that visitdy is planned and exists in TV

Outcome:
  Message: Visit Day cannot be found in Trial Visit (TV) domain
  Output Variables:
    - VISITDY
    - VISITNUM
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Value
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0032
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: For planned visits, values of VISIT, VISITNUM, and
                  VISITDY must be those defined in the Trial Visits (TV) dataset (Section
                  7.3.1, Trial Visits).
                Document: IG v3.4
                Item: ''
                Section: 4.4.5
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - ALL
  Domains:
    Exclude:
      - TV

json.Description: Verify that visitdy is planned and exists in TV

Outcome.Message: Visit Day cannot be found in Trial Visit (TV) domain

Citations.Cited_Guidance: For planned visits, values of VISIT, VISITNUM, and VISITDY must be those defined in the Trial Visits (TV) dataset (Section 7.3.1, Trial Visits).
